column2: During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother encourage you to refrain from smoking?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother discourage you to have friends who smoke?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother discuss the dangers of smoking with you?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother talk with you about what you can and cannot do with regard to smoking?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother talk about punishment if you smoked?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother tell you not to smoke?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother talk with you about the glamorizing of film and screen smoking?
During the last 12 months, how many times did your mother advise you how to resist peer pressure to use tobacco?
